text: @kimguilfoyle @BilldeBlasio @ericgarcetti Heard you have COVID-19 Kimberly. Please tell me that you recently gave the President a hug or a kiss. Has Don Jr. visited the President recently? KARMA! The one that is failing you is your boyfriend's father who just told you to live with COVID-19! https://t.co/RGGCZCJTQ5
